<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cobra Envenom](/Feats.aspx?ID=6018) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=656" />
<trait label="Poison" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=669" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 124 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Frequency**
once per minute.

**Prerequisites**
[Cobra Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=5990); expert in unarmed strikes

**Requirements**
You are in Cobra Stance.

</column>

---

You slightly dislocate your joints to lash out with devious intent and the power to envenom your foe. Make a cobra fang Strike. Your [reach](/Traits.aspx?ID=684) with this Strike is 5 feet greater than normal. If this Strike hits, the [persistent poison damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from your [venomous](/Traits.aspx?ID=785) trait increases to 1d4 persistent poison damage per weapon damage die.

**Special** If you have this feat, the circumstance bonus to Fortitude saves and Fortitude DC granted by Cobra Stance increases from +1 to +2.
name: Cobra Envenom
prerequisite: Cobra Stance; expert in unarmed strikes
